TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerResponse extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListenerResponse Implements IDisposable
public ref class HttpListenerResponse sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示对 对象正在处理的请求的响应。

span.span: Represents a response to a request being handled by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端发出请求的资源由对象，请求和响应都提供给你的应用程序中对象。When a client makes a request for a resource handled by an object, the request and response are made available to your application in an object. 请求由对象，并可用于属性。The request is represented by an object and is available in the property. 响应由对象，并可用于属性。The response is represented by an object and is available in the property. 可以通过设置各种属性，如自定义响应， ，和。You can customize the response by setting various properties, such as , , and . 使用属性来获取实例数据可以写入到的响应。Use the property to obtain a instance to which response data can be written. 最后，将响应数据发送到客户端通过调用方法。Finally, send the response data to the client by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭到客户端的连接而不发送响应。

span.span: Closes the connection to the client without sending a response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在已关闭的对象上调用此方法起任何作用。Calling this method on an object that has already been closed has no effect. 如果尚未结束响应，此方法关闭它并关联和对象。If the response has not already been closed, this method closes it and the associated and objects. 客户端连接也是已关闭，而不考虑的客户端请求的属性值。The connection to the client is also closed, regardless of the property value of the client request.

Public Sub AddHeader (name As String, value As String)

The value for the name header.

summary.span: 将指定的标头和值添加到此响应的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Adds the specified header and value to the HTTP headers for this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法等效于调用方法返回的集合属性。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method on the collection returned by the property. 如果在指定的标头`name`不存在，此方法将插入到新的标头属性的集合。If the header specified in `name` does not exist, this method inserts a new header into the property's collection. 如果`name`是否存在于集合，此方法替换为现有值与`value`。If `name` is present in the collection, this method replaces the existing value with `value`. 若要将值添加到现有标头中，而不是替换现有的值，使用方法。To add a value to an existing header without replacing the existing value, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加使用此属性的标头。The following code example demonstrates adding a header using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#26)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Content-Length`标头表示响应的正文数据的长度，以字节为单位。The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the response's body data. 当使用不发送数据的格式分块或原始，必须设置属性。When using a format that is not send the data chunked or raw, you must set the property. 如果你不希望这样做，不发送响应数据。If you do not, the does not send the response data. 响应标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of response headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::CookieCollection ^ Cookies { System::Net::CookieCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Net::CookieCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置随响应返回的 Cookie 集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of cookies returned with the response.
A that contains cookies to accompany the response.

value.span: 如果没有向响应添加任何 Cookie，则该集合为空。

span.span: The collection is empty if no cookies have been added to the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是从存储在本地 （客户端） 计算机的 Web 服务器的名称/值文本数据。A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer. 支持以下 cookie 格式： Netscape、 RFC 2109 和 RFC 2965。The following cookie formats are supported: Netscape, RFC 2109, and RFC 2965. Netscape 的 cookie 规范位于http://wp.netscape.com/newsref/std/cookie_spec.html; RFC 文档位于[ http://www.rfc-editor.org ](http://www.rfc-editor.org)。The Netscape cookie specification is available at http://wp.netscape.com/newsref/std/cookie_spec.html; the RFC documents are available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查 cookie 的请求，并返回一个新的 cookie 与响应，如果请求没有。The following code example checks a request for a cookie, and returns a new cookie with the response if the request did not have one. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyFrom(class System.Net.HttpListenerResponse templateResponse) cil managed

span.span: The instance to copy.

summary.span: 将属性从指定的 复制到此响应。

span.span: Copies properties from the specified to this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你定期将更改许多属性从其默认值为一组固定的新值，可以方便地使用作为模板的实例。If you regularly change many properties from their default values to a fixed set of new values, it is convenient to use an instance as a template. 自定义模板响应一次和，而不是单独配置每个响应，请调用方法来配置新的响应基于模板响应中的属性值。Customize the template response once and, instead of configuring each response separately, call the method to configure a new response based on property values in the template response. 以下属性将从此复制`templateResponse`到当前实例。The following properties are copied from `templateResponse` to the current instance. - - - - - - ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建通过复制模板响应的响应。The following code example demonstrates creating a response by copying a template response. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ Headers { System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器返回的标头名称/值对集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs returned by the server.

value.span: 实例，包含要包括在响应中的所有显式设置的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: A instance that contains all the explicitly set HTTP headers to be included in the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 响应标头包含元数据信息，例如的日期和的响应时间、 响应的服务器和响应正文中包含的数据的 MIME 类型的标识。Response headers contain metadata information such as the date and time of the response, the identity of the responding server, and the MIME type of the data contained in the response body. 响应标头的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of response headers, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 如果你尝试设置内容长度，保持活动状态、 传输编码，否则将引发 WWW 身份验证标头使用的标头属性，异常。If you attempt to set a Content-Length, Keep-Alive, Transfer-Encoding, or WWW-Authenticate header using the Headers property, an exception will be thrown. 使用或属性设置这些标头。Use the or properties to set these headers. 不能手动设置的传输编码或 WWW 身份验证标头。You cannot set the Transfer-Encoding or WWW-Authenticate headers manually. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示中的标头。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers in a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#23)]

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的 实例对响应无效。

span.span: The instance specified for a set operation is not valid for a response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器是否请求持久性连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server requests a persistent connection.

value.span: 如果服务器请求持久性连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the server requests a persistent connection; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 客户端和服务器预计在短时间多次交换数据，持续性连接可允许客户以避免需要打开和关闭每个消息的 TCP 连接的开销，从而加快其通信。If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message. 永久连接已被广泛采用在现代 Web 浏览器和 Web 服务器之间的通信。Persistent connections are in widespread use in communications between modern Web browsers and Web servers. 中的 HTTP/1.1 协议规范 (RFC 2616) 从 RTF 编辑器站点中可用的详细描述了永久连接 ([http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org))。Persistent connections are described in detail in the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification (RFC 2616) available at the RTF Editor Web site ([http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#7)]

span.span: This object is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SendChunked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置响应是否使用分块传输编码。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the response uses chunked transfer encoding.

value.span: 如果响应设置为使用 Chunked 传输编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the response is set to use chunked transfer encoding; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分块的消息的正文由区块的一系列组成。The body of a chunked message is made up of a series of chunks. 每个区块两部分组成 — 区块数据和实际数据的大小。Each chunk comprises of two parts—the size of the chunk data and the actual data. 当设置为 true 响应发送使用分块传输编码。When set to true the response is sent using chunked transfer encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个 cookie 将被视为相同的值及其， ，和属性都是相同。Two cookies are considered the same if the values of their , , and properties are the same. 如果这三个部分信息相同，该方法将尝试更新 cookie。If these three pieces of information are the same, the method attempts to update the cookie. 名称和域比较不区分大小写，但路径比较不区分大小写。The name and domain comparisons are not case sensitive, but the path comparison is case sensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. span.span: The cookie already exists in the collection and could not be replaced.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int StatusCode { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置返回给客户端的 HTTP 状态代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP status code to be returned to the client.

value.span: 为请求的资源指定 HTTP 状态代码的 值。

span.span: An value that specifies the HTTP status code for the requested resource.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示服务器成功处理了客户端的请求并将请求的资源包括在响应正文中。

span.span: The default is , indicating that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端使用由服务器返回的状态代码来确定如何继续。Clients use the status code returned by the server to decide how to proceed. 值为指示服务器已成功处理客户端的请求和响应正文中包含请求的资源。A value of indicates that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body. 其他常见的状态代码包括，该值指示在服务器上，找不到请求的资源和，指示它不必要的响应正文中返回请求的资源，因为客户端的缓存的副本资源是最新。Other common status codes include , indicating that the requested resource was not found on the server, and , indicating that it was unnecessary to return the requested resource in the response body because the client's cached copy of the resource is up-to-date. 有关可能的状态代码的完整列表，请参阅枚举。For a complete list of possible status codes, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#7)]

span.span: This object is closed.

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is not valid.

exception.span: 有效值介于 100 和 999 之间（包含 100 和 999）。

span.span: Valid values are between 100 and 999 inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ StatusDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置返回给客户端的 HTTP 状态代码的文本说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a text description of the HTTP status code returned to the client.

value.span: 返回给客户端的 HTTP 状态代码的文本说明。

span.span: The text description of the HTTP status code returned to the client.

value.span: 默认值为 属性值的 RFC 2616 说明，如果不存在 RFC 2616 说明，则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default is the RFC 2616 description for the property value, or an empty string ("") if an RFC 2616 description does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 状态说明通常提供详细信息，说明值。The status description typically provides details that explain the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#7)]

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值包含不可打印的字符。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation contains non-printable characters.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来发送响应并释放资源由持有。Use the method to send the response and release resources held by an . 放弃响应并释放此实例所持有的资源，请使用方法。To discard the response and release the resources held by this instance, use the method.
